name: stock-analyzer
description: Comprehensive stock analysis platform with DCF valuation, factor screening, and portfolio management

scripts.deploy-backend: cd infrastructure && sam build && sam deploy
scripts.deploy-frontend: cd frontend && aws s3 sync . s3://$(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name stock-analyzer-stack --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey==`FrontendBucketName`].OutputValue' --output text)/ --delete

author: Your Name
